reviewsJson.markdown:
**SSA Bakery Orange** 3% 70VG 30PG 1.5 mg Nic

Tested on Wotofo Recurve with SS316L Flapton 0.25 ohms, 430F at 55W

​

**SnV:** Big lemon taste up front, like FE Lemon.Small hints of orange in the back. Has a 'warm' feeling to it.

**3 Day steep:** Lemon has feeded to the back and more orange is coming up.It as a little winter spice note as well, but i can't define the spice yet.

**5 Days steep:** Really good orange at this point, it as some warm spice notes like cinnamon but very very faint.

**7 Days steep:** Amazing warm, slightly spiced orange.It's the orange/citrus equivalent of PUR Country Apple + FLV Apple Filling.

Personal take, it's my flavor of the year. Its so good, i love orange flaors and warm winter spices and this is it. Its exactly like cooking/boiling oranges with warm spices. Christmas feelings, happy days.Google image  'orange winter spice' and you'll get what i mean.

**Off Flavors**: None

**Suggested Pairings**: Bakeries (duh), other fruits that can take a little warm spice

​

Edit:

Bonus recipe time!

[https://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/3725377/Bespoke%20Autumn](https://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/3725377/Bespoke%20Autumn)

​

|Co.|Flavor|%|
|:-|:-|:-|
|FA|7 Leaves Ultimate|1.5|
|FLV|Apple Filling|1|
|SSA|Bakery Orange|1|
|TFA|Pear|2|

7 days steep!

Inspired by Cabin

reviewsJson.title: Bakery Orange
